title: Bitcoin’s ‘biggest bull catalyst’ may be the next Fed chair pick: Novogratz

body.raw: Mike Novogratz said “of course” Bitcoin could reach $200,000 if the Federal Reserve adopts a highly dovish stance following a leadership change.
